mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RANT_MAIN SET RM_YMD = #{strRMYmd}, RM_START_TIME = #{strRMStartTime}, RM_END_TIME = #{strRMEndTime}, RM_RANT_PROD = #{strRMRantProd}, RM_RANT_BCODE = #{strRMRantBcode}, RM_REQUEST_USER = #{strRMReqUser}, RM_APPROVAL_USESR = #{strRMApproUser}, RM_REQUEST_MEMO = #{strRMReqMemo}, RM_MEMO = #{strRMMemo}
